name: Seer's Light
description:
5/5/2021 - Demo out now!

Seer’s Light is a 2D, point and click story game following Seer as she seeks out the Guardian. She journeys in search for The Fifth Realm, only talked about in hushed whispers and children’s fairy tales. Find items, learn about magic, and help Seer find answers in this mysterious world!

3/1/2021 - Game is in development!

Seer's Light is a 2D visual novel made in Unity. The concept art/illustrations as well as the tech side of the game was made by myself with the help of Fungus.
